Package code.GameplayElements.Bricks

Class Brick

java.lang.Object
code.GameplayElements.Bricks.Brick
Direct Known Subclasses:
BrickCement, BrickClay, BrickSteel
public abstract class Brick extends Object
Represents a brick
Author:
Jordan Lovett - modified
